code: import React from"react";import{addPostAC}from"../../../Redux/profileReducer";import{connect}from"react-redux";import ProfileDescription from"./ProfileDescription";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{profilePage:state.profilePage,likeValue:state.profilePage.likeValue};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{onAddPost:function onAddPost(newText){dispatch(addPostAC(newText));}};};var ProfileDescriptionContainer=connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(ProfileDescription);export default ProfileDescriptionContainer;
